name: The Shapeshifting Detective
description: The Shapeshifting Detective is a supernatural murder mystery FMV game where you play as a detective who can shapeshift into other characters, allowing you to unlock secret conversations and private encounters. From the makers of "The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
